short_summary: to fulfill the mandate of the Center of Excellence research papers are to be prepared and submitted.
full_summary:
# Canadian Defence Academy Research Papers - Indigenous
### Tender Information

#### Description
The Canadian Defence Academy seeks proposals for the development of research papers related to Indigenous issues. The papers should be of high quality and provide expert analysis, expertise, and best practices to inform the Canadian Armed Forces' operational requirements and contribute to policy and concept development, doctrine, military training and education, and personnel readiness.

#### Contract Details

* Contract Number: cb-260-51204511
* Solicitation Number: W4938-23-101S
* Tender Closing Date: **2023-10-20T17:00:00**
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31
* Region of Delivery: Kingston
* Trade Agreements: None

#### Solicitation Type

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a competitive, selective tendering process. Variations or combinations of the evaluation methods will be used to select a contractor.

#### Bidder Eligibility

There are no trade agreements or restrictions on bidder eligibility in this solicitation.

#### Proposal Requirements

The winning contractor will be required to provide a comprehensive research paper that meets the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the quality of the proposal, the expertise and qualifications of the contractor, and the relevance of the proposed research to the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work.

#### Contact Information

* Jameson Wood, Procurement Officer
	+ Email: [Jameson.Wood@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jameson.Wood@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 422-4789
	+ Address: 2 Ridout Sq., Kingston, ON, K7K 7B4, Canada

### How to Bid

The RFP document can be downloaded from the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21281/w4938-23-101s-rfp-indigenous-english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21281/w4938-23-101s-rfp-indigenous-english.pdf)

Andrew Ding will assess this rewritten text for you.
